sentence.Network_en: The poems rhyme too determinedly, ungainly as pairs tied together in a three - legged race.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些诗的韵脚硬绑绑的, 象两人各把一条腿绑在一起参加三腿竞走那样笨拙.

sentence.Network_en: Please line up at the starting line for the three - legged race.
sentence.Network_cn: 请参加两人三足的快点到起跑线准备.

sentence.Network_en: Believe me, sister and men are more than three - legged frog much more.
sentence.Network_cn: 相信我, 妹妹,男人多的是,比三条腿的青蛙多得多.

list.abs: a three - legged stool ; a three - legged race ., 三条腿的凳子 ; 三足赛跑.

i have a cup with three legs ., 我有一个三只脚的杯子.
